amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for the Violence Against Women Act Legal Assistance Program by $4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease appropriations for Departmental Management by $4 million and increase appropriations for the Office on Violence Against Women by $4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 425 - 4 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Moore (WI) amendment (A004).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 0 (Roll no. 390).
